overview: Hyun Won-bin, who is perfect in appearance, education, and financial power, is planning to sleep with 10,000 women, surpassing Casanova's record of sleeping with 1,000 women.  She sets her own strict principles, and she wants to become a real Casanova that no one can deny.  In order to achieve her own record regardless of her virginity, she is busy with every day.  And that's exactly what she said today, the day she gets to sleep with the four girls she promised last time.  For the incredible record of sleeping with 10,000 women, he struggles to have sex with his waist bent even today.
title: Nuke
